text: Space Shuttle Endeavour (OV-105) was the fifth space shuttle run by NASA. It replaced the Space Shuttle Challenger. Endeavour was named after Captain James Cooks's ship, HMS Endeavour. It made 25 trips into space, travelling about 123,000,000 miles. It is now on display at the California Science Center. ==References== *Space Shuttle Overview: Endeavour (OV-105) *"Shuttle Orbiter Endeavour (OV-105)" Endeavour
title: Space Shuttle Endeavour
